pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.grid
======================================

.. py:module:: pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.grid


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.grid.Grid


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Grid(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Base`


   `Gird` Drawing grid in rectangular coordinate. In a single grid,
   at most two X and Y axes each is allowed. Line chart, bar chart,
   and scatter chart (bubble chart) can be drawn in grid.


   .. py:attribute:: options
      :type:  pyecharts.types.Optional[dict]
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: bg_color


   .. py:method:: add(chart: pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart, grid_opts: pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.options.GridOpts, dict], *, grid_index: int = 0, is_control_axis_index: bool = False)
